Corporate Social Responsibility

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY
We make people our first priority, empowered by technology that makes a positive impact on humanity and the world around us. Our Progress












Environmental and social responsibility are integral to our continued success. FY21 REPORT








 





Our People












We strive to create a culture that recognizes the unique contributions of all employees. Learn More








 





Our Community












Our work—and our people—are transforming communities around the world. Read More






























































The World's Brightest Minds. One Unique Event.
Trustworthy–or responsible–AI aims to minimize unintended harm from AI deployments while maximizing benefits. Join us at GTC to learn more about this important topic.

Trustworthy AI: Data Privacy in the Digital Age and Beyond











The Honorable Zoe Lofgren, Member of Congress
Saori Kaji, NVIDIA

Join NVIDIA and Congresswoman Zoe Lofgren (CA-19) as they discuss what building trustworthy technology means today and the expectations of consumers, lawmakers, and regulators in this great and consequential turning point in history. View Details





















Measuring and Mitigating Bias in AI











Anima Anandkumar, Director of ML Research, NVIDIA

Our rapid progress in AI needs to be coupled with measures to ensure that it's deployed responsibly and ethically. Join Anima as she describes how to define, measure, and mitigate these issues, and introduce recent principled AI algorithms designed to satisfy the requirements. View Details


























GTC registrants can enjoy exclusive access to sessions until April 11, 2022. SIGN IN








SEE ALL AI SESSIONS









































 























EARTH-2
Building the world’s most powerful AI supercomputer will transform how we predict climate change. READ CEO MESSAGE












































TACKLING CLIMATE CHANGE














 


















100%
of our global energy use will be from renewable sources by 2025.

40x
more energy efficiency with GPUs over traditional CPU servers for AI. 23
of top 25 supercomputers on the November 2021 Green500 powered by NVIDIA.

SUPPORTING THE UN’S SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS
The United Nations adopted 17 Sustainable Development Goals to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all. Here are just a few of the things we do to support these goals. Healthcare












We’re helping scientists, clinicians, and medical professionals use AI to tackle critical challenges like drug discovery, disease detection, and personalized healthcare. The NVIDIA Clara™ platform is key to these efforts, increasing diagnostic accuracy, enabling the medical imaging community to improve patient outcomes, and reducing the cost of care. Learn More 








 


















Emerging Markets












We’re growing our emerging markets initiatives to better connect with developers worldwide. Our GPU Technology Conference—virtual, free to register, and content available on-demand—features a dedicated track on AI in emerging markets.

Learn More 








 


















Environment












We’re supporting innovative, impactful, and sustainable environmental projects in India. We partner with established NGOs to help generate oxygen, sequester carbon, reduce greenhouse gases, and minimize instances of sanitation-related diseases—all while improving livelihoods through job creation.
